labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.system_settings: Windows 10 pro 64bit Version 1703 Build 15063.608 (on iMac hardware, bootcamp partition)
data.actual_result: You hear only the voice server (game is silenced)
data.expected_result: you must hear game sound and voice channel on your bluetooth earphones
data.short_description: Bluetooth game audio removed when joining a voice channel
data.steps_to_repro: - Step 1: pair a bluetooth earphone - Step 2: keep default microphone as audio input - Step 3: open the game "Final Fantasy XIV" and move to some place with sounds (e.g. the character selection screen) - Step 4: open discord - Step 5: join a voice channel
